My name is Aidan Clyens. Ever since I was a little kid, I always had an interest in building things. In high school, tinkering with electronics and Arduino microcontrollers lead me into engineering.
I majored in Computer Engineering at the University of Waterloo from 2016 - 2021, where I earned my Bachelor of Applied Science.
I studied embedded systems, computational intelligence, computer architecture, computer networks, operating systems, and distributed systems.
My go-to languages are C++ and Python. Currently my main focus is in embedded systems programming.
